name: Cursed Enigma - The Midnight Apartment
description:
The Midnight Apartment marks the next chapter in the psychological horror series: CurseEnigma. It's about Franco, a man who recently got divorced and is trying to get used to his new home in an old Italian village. As he settles in, he meets strange neighbors, and a feeling of being watched and followed by an unknown force gets stronger after sunset. The game tells an exciting story, exploring the mysterious lives of the people in the building and revealing what happened to the person who lived there before. It deals with themes like being alone, not trusting others, and the mysterious connections between people in this creepy and mysterious psychological horror experience.

Gameplay

This game is a first-person psychological horror experience. It features narrative, object finding, and conversation mechanics. The plot unfolds through missions and interactions with characters, guiding the player to explore the darker side of the building and uncover well-guarded secrets.

Key Features

  • 80’s film aesthetic.
  • Talk with NPCs to find the suspect.
  • Atmospheric environment
  • Interact with the environment
